testcase.name: Validate all text is visible with proper writing
Validate error messages should be displayed properly and in the correct position
Verify all error messages should be displayed in same CSS style
Verify general confirmation messages should be displayed using CSS style either than error message style
Verify tooltips text should be meaningful
Verify all placeholder is displayed properly and meaningful
Verify password is masked when eye icon is not clicked
Verify password is masked when eye icon is clicked
Verify application crash handling method and should be redirected to error page
Verify all text on page for spelling and grammatical errors
Verify all field on the page should be aligned properly
Verify enough space should be provided between title, email field, password field and login button
Verify font size, style, and color for headline, description text, labels, infield data, and grid info should be standard as specified in PRD
Verify upon clicking on the input text field, the mouse arrow pointer should get changed to the cursor
Check all pages for broken images
Check all pages for broken links
Verify Page text is justified correctly
